"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d0158c-1a6c-439e-2eec-72c4f422057a#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: III. Honorius megerősíti a ferences regulát, 1295 k. Assisi, San Francesco, felső templom, hosszház, freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: III. Honorius reinforce the Franciscan regulation, About 1295,  Assisi, San Francesco, upper church, length house, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: III. verstärkt Honorius die 
Franziskanerregelung, ungefähr 1295, Assisi, San Francesco, obere 
Kirche, Länge Haus, Fresko.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : III. Honorius renforce le 
règlement franciscain, environ 1295, Assisi, San Francesco, église 
supérieure, maison de longueur, fresque.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: III. Honorius reforça o 
regulamento franciscan, aproximadamente 1295, Assisi, San Francesco, 
igreja superior, casa do comprimento, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: III. Honorius rinforza la 
regolazione franciscan, circa 1295, Assisi, il San Francesco, la 
chiesa superiore, la casa di lunghezza, fresco.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: ΙΙΙ. Honorius ενισχύει το 
φραντσησθανό κανονισμό, περίπου 1295, Assisi, SAN 
Francesco, ανώτερη εκκλησία, σπίτι μήκους, νωπογραφία.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: III. Honorius refuerza la 
regulación franciscana, cerca de 1295, Assisi, San Francesco, iglesia
superior, casa de la longitud, fresco.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Giotto: III. Honorius megerősíti a ferences regulát, 1295 k. Assisi, San Francesco, felső templom, hosszház. freskó.</string>
            <string language="en">Giotto: III. Honorius reinforce the Fraciscian regulation, about 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, upper church, lenght house. fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Assisi,  Szent Ferenc,  Giotto,  III. Honorius,  Ferences-rend,  </string>
            <string language="en">Assisi,  Saint Francis,  Giotto,  III. Honorius, Franciscan Order ,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giotto: III. verstärkt Honorius die Fraciscian 
Regelung, ungefähr 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, obere Kirche, 
lenght Hausfresko.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giotto : III. Honorius renforce le règlement de 
Fraciscian, environ 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, église 
supérieure, fresque de maison de lenght.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giotto: III. Honorius reforça o regulamento de 
Fraciscian, aproximadamente 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, igreja 
superior, fresco da casa do lenght.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giotto: III. Honorius rinforza la regolazione di 
Fraciscian, circa 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, chiesa superiore,
fresco della casa del lenght.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giotto: ΙΙΙ. Honorius ενισχύει το 
Fraciscian κανονισμό, περίπου 1295, Assisi, SAN 
Francesco, ανώτερη εκκλησία, lenght νωπογραφία σπιτιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giotto: III. Honorius refuerza la regulación de 
Fraciscian, cerca de 1295. Assisi, San Francesco, iglesia 
superior, casa del lenght. fresco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Assisi, Heiliger Francis, Giotto, III. Honorius, 
Franziskanerordnung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assisi, Saint Francis, Giotto, III. Honorius, Commande 
Franciscaine,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Assisi, Saint Francis, Giotto, III. Honorius, Ordem 
Franciscan,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assisi, San Francis, Giotto, III. Honorius, Ordine 
Franciscan,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Assisi, Αγιος Francis, Giotto, ΙΙΙ. Honorius, φραντσησθανή κατάταξη,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Assisi, Santo Francis, Giotto, III. Honorius, Orden 
Franciscana,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
